com.brightcove.player.display

Class CaptioningChangeListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.accessibility.CaptioningManager.CaptioningChangeListener
      • com.brightcove.player.display.CaptioningChangeListener

  • public class CaptioningChangeListener
extends android.view.accessibility.CaptioningManager.CaptioningChangeListener
    This class connects up changes to the system level captioning styles with the HLS (VisualOn) player.
